It will seem like simplified English: It will seem like simplified English
If several languages coalesce the gramma: If several languages coalesce the grammar
As a skeptical Cambridge friend of mine: As a skeptical Cambridge friend of mine occidental
cookie_paragraph_one: We use cookies to enable the proper functioning and security of our websites and to provide you with the best possible experience. By clicking on Accept, you consent to the use of cookies for advertising and statistical purposes. You can change your cookie settings at any time. For more information about these technologies and how to change your privacy preferences, please see
cookie_paragraph_two: Decide which cookies and technologies are activated when you visit our website.
cookie_paragraph_three: These cookies are necessary for the proper functioning of our website, to enable smooth navigation and to access the most important functions. This includes both essential security and accessibility features, as well as preferences such as interface and language.
cookie_paragraph_four: These cookies and other technologies are used to offer you more relevant advertising based on your interests. By selecting this category, you also consent to the sending of your data by COMPANIES to third parties outside the European Union (e.g. Google), including the sharing of hashed email addresses.
cookie_paragraph_five: These cookies measure how our website is used. We use this information to improve our website and our services. With these cookies we measure, for example, how often users return and which functions they use.
cookie_paragraph_six: These cookies allow us to offer you better functionality and personalization on our website. For example, we can personalize your experience based on the pages you have visited.
landing_hero_credits: This site uses free content from Pixabay and Pexels
tac_subtilte_1: These terms and conditions of use are effective as of April 30, 2025.
tac_paragraph_1: Welcome to Aziende! These Terms and Conditions of Use (hereinafter, "Terms") apply to your (hereinafter, "you") use of the Aziende platform (hereinafter, the "Service"). By using the Service, you agree that these Terms constitute the legally binding contract between you (the user) and the Aziende Contracting Entity, identified in these Terms as Comerx LLC (hereinafter, "Aziende").
tac_paragraph_2:
Welcome to Aziende! These Terms and Conditions of Use (hereinafter, "Terms") apply to your use (hereinafter, "you" or "your") of the Aziende visual communication platform (hereinafter, the "Service"). By using the Service, you agree that these Terms constitute the legally binding agreement between you and the contracting entity of Aziende identified in these Terms as Comerx LLC (hereinafter, "Aziende").
 a. Use of Aziende. Aziende is a platform that allows you to design, publish, and manage websites (each of which will hereinafter be referred to as a "Site"). When using the Service, you will have access to various content provided by Aziende and other content providers for use in your Sites (hereinafter, "Licensed Content"). Your use of Licensed Content is subject to the Content License Agreement. You also have the option to upload your own content (hereinafter, "User Content"), such as videos, images, and files, over which you will have full control and responsibility. You may use Licensed Content, your User Content, and all the tools available on Aziende to create your Sites.
 The Service is available on the Aziende website, Aziende mobile apps, Aziende desktop applications, and other means provided or facilitated by Aziende. Your use of the Service is subject to these Terms and Aziende's Acceptable Use Policy. By using the Service, you acknowledge and agree to Aziende's Privacy Policy.
 You may only use the Service if you are able to enter into a binding contract with Aziende and are legally permitted to do so. By using the Service, you represent and warrant that you have the full right, power, and authority to accept this Agreement and to fulfill all obligations stated herein.
 b. Registering with a third-party-managed email. If you register for the Service with an email associated with your employer or another organization ("Admin Entity"), (i) you represent and warrant that you have sufficient authority to bind the Admin Entity to these Terms; (ii) your use of the Service will bind your employer or organization to this Agreement; and (iii) the consent expressed in these Terms will represent both you and the Admin Entity. The Aziende account you create using an email associated with an Admin Entity will be an "Administered Account."
 If you registered for the Service with an Administered Account at the request of the Admin Entity, Aziende may:
 a. share your email, name, and basic account data with the Admin Entity and transfer control over the Administered Account to the Admin Entity.
 If your Administered Account is transferred, the Admin Entity may access, transfer, and control it, and do the same with all content and Sites associated with it. They may also: a. make changes to the Administered Account and its billing settings, privacy preferences, folder permissions, and delete the Administered Account.
 If your Admin Entity requests to take control of your Administered Account, Aziende will notify you and give you the opportunity to transfer your content and Sites to a personal Aziende account (provided you supply a valid email address) before the Administered Account is transferred. Our plans are designed for teams, businesses, and organizations of any size that wish to work and design collaboratively. If you create a team on behalf of an organization or employer, you are binding them to these Terms and all obligations contained herein. If you are not authorized to do so, an authorized person must create the team.
tac_paragraph_3:
a. Minimum age. Children may not access or use the Service unless they do so with the express permission of a parent, legal guardian, or another authorized adult (e.g., teachers), and this person agrees to comply with these Terms. In these Terms, "child" means anyone under the age of 18 (or the minimum legal age required to provide consent for personal data processing in their place of residence). Legal restrictions may apply to the provision of certain services to children.
 b. Access to the Service. By accepting these Terms, you are granted a non-exclusive, limited, non-transferable, and freely revocable license to access and use the Service for personal or business purposes. Aziende reserves all rights not expressly granted in these Terms. Each person must have a unique account. You are responsible for all activity conducted through your account. You may not allow third parties to access or use the Service using your username, password, or other security codes.
 c. Acceptable Use Policy. Your use of the Service, your User Content, and your Sites must comply with our Acceptable Use Policy. If you fail to comply with any part of Aziende's Acceptable Use Policy, Aziende may remove the violating User Content and/or Sites, or suspend or terminate your account immediately.
 d. Anti-discrimination. Aziende does not support or tolerate the use of its Service to discriminate against others, especially on the basis of race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability, ancestry, or nationality. You are not permitted to use the Service in a way that incites, promotes, or supports such discrimination. You also may not use the Service to incite or promote hostility or violence.
 e. Restrictions on Use. You shall not, either directly or through a third party: i) rent, lease, sell, distribute, offer in a service bureau, license, or otherwise make the Service or licensed Content available to any third party (except as permitted under these Terms); ii) copy, replicate, decompile, reverse engineer, or attempt to derive source code from, modify, or create derivative works of the Service or any part thereof; iii) access the Service to conduct performance benchmarking; iv) access the Service to build or promote a competing product; v) use the Service to store or transmit viruses or malicious code; vi) use a virtual private network (VPN) to obtain geo-regulated content or pricing; vii) use the Service to send unsolicited or bulk emails; viii) engage in any kind of data mining, extraction, or scraping of the Service or its content for machine learning or other purposes; or ix) circumvent any measures we use to prevent or restrict access to the Service, including features that restrict use or copying of content or limit use of the Service or licensed Content.
tac_paragraph_4:
a. Information Security. Aziende implements and maintains physical, technical, and administrative security measures designed to protect your data from unauthorized access, destruction, use, modification, and disclosure.
 b. Data Privacy. Aziende's Privacy Policy describes how Aziende collects, uses, transfers, discloses, and stores your personal data. By creating an Aziende Teams account, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and accepted our Privacy Policy and all the Terms of Service under which Aziende processes your name and data in connection with your use of the Service. In the event of any conflict with the Terms of Service, the provisions in our Terms, Agreements, and Policies shall prevail.
tac_paragraph_5:
a. User Content. You represent and warrant that you own, or have secured all necessary rights to, your User Content to access, use, and distribute it as described in these Terms. As between you and Aziende, you retain all rights, title, and interest in your User Content. You grant Aziende a royalty-free, sublicensable license to display, host, copy, store, and use your User Content strictly as necessary to provide the Service. If you include User Content in a Site shared with others, you grant Aziende a perpetual, royalty-free, sublicensable license to display, host, copy, store, and use your User Content strictly as necessary to keep the Site available.
 When you upload content to Aziende, you warrant that you hold all rights to it. We do not claim ownership of your content, but we do need certain rights to store and make it available for your use on your Sites.
 You agree that, if permitted via your account privacy settings, Aziende, its affiliates, and third-party service providers enabling the Service may use your User Content to develop, improve, and provide AI products and services, including through machine learning technologies.
 b. Licensed Content. You may use Licensed Content in connection with the Service. Use of Licensed Content is subject to additional license rights and restrictions specified in the Content License Agreement.
 Applicable license rights and restrictions vary depending on the type and origin of the Licensed Content.
 c. Sites. Your Sites may include a combination of User Content and Licensed Content. While you retain ownership of your User Content, the use of Sites that include Licensed Content is subject to the applicable terms of the Content License Agreement.
 d. Sharing and Publishing Your Sites and Content. You may publish or share Sites and Content with others through the Service, a third-party service, or via links. Aziende is not responsible for the distribution of such Sites and Content. Any functionality provided by Aziende or actions performed by the Service to publicly share Sites and Content according to your instructions will not be considered a breach of Aziende's obligations under these Terms.
tac_paragraph_6:
You may use the Service to design and publish a website (hereinafter, "Aziende Site"). Users of the free version of Aziende may publish an unlimited number of Aziende Sites using a free URL or any other defined by Aziende. If you have a paid subscription, you can publish Aziende Sites based on existing plans and additional purchase options, being able to create unlimited Aziende Sites and link up to one (1) existing domain. Similarly, each team will be assigned a free subdomain.
 a. Free URLs provided by Aziende. If you use a free URL provided by Aziende, your website will include a tool to report Aziende Sites that do not comply with these Terms and a badge with the legend "Designed with Aziende" (or a similar expression) that links to Aziende. Also, Aziende reserves the right to reject or remove at its discretion any domain name it deems inappropriate (for example, if the domain does not comply with the Acceptable Use Policy).
 b. Purchasing domain names through Aziende. When purchasing, renewing, or transferring a domain name through Aziende, "Comerx LLC" acts as a reseller of domain name registration services through our external registrar, Namecheap, Inc. (hereinafter, "Namecheap"). If you purchase a domain name through Aziende, you agree to and must comply with Namecheap's Master Registration Agreement (hereinafter, the "Namecheap Terms"). Failure to comply with the Namecheap Terms also constitutes a breach of these Terms.
 Your use of our domain services is subject to the policies of the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers, whose website is https://icann.org (hereinafter, "ICANN"). You agree to comply with ICANN's requirements, standards, policies, procedures, and practices.
 You agree that, by submitting a request or registering or renewing your domain name, you represent and warrant the following: i) that all information provided to Aziende or Namecheap is true and correct, complete, and not misleading in any way, and that the request is made in good faith, and ii) that you have not previously submitted any request for the proposed domain name that has been rejected.
 You must provide Aziende with the cooperation and support it reasonably requires to provide the Service related to your Aziende Site by performing, among others, the following actions: i) promptly responding to communications from Aziende; ii) providing accurate and prompt responses when reasonably requested for information or documentation, including that necessary to meet ICANN's verification requirements; iii) agreeing that your information may be shared with ICANN and Namecheap, and iv) obtaining all necessary intellectual property rights and/or other consents and authorizations for the proposed domain name.
 Registering a domain name does not confer any ownership rights over it and will not be considered proof of ownership. The registration may be challenged by third parties after its registration and may also be canceled if any of the aforementioned warranties are found to be false, incomplete, or contain incorrect or misleading data.
 You are responsible for renewing your domain name. Aziende is not responsible for a domain name being unavailable or canceled, regardless of the reason.
 You must not imply any misleading relationship of promotion or affiliation with Aziende on an Aziende Site. This includes, among others, attempting to register a domain name or subdomain that includes the word "AZIENDE" or any other trademark or registered trademark of Aziende or its affiliated companies. Aziende may include or require certain terms to appear on an Aziende Site at any time and for any reason.
 c. Processing Personal Data on your Aziende Site. If you use functionalities to collect or process personal data on your Aziende Site, you declare that you have read, understood, and accepted our Terms, Agreements, and Policies in their entirety, and that with respect to Personal Data subject to applicable laws on such data that Aziende processes on your behalf in relation to your Aziende Site. In case of conflict between these Terms, our Terms, Agreements, and Policies shall prevail.
tac_paragraph_7: You may use AI-powered applications that Aziende makes available through the Service from time to time. Your use of AI-powered Products is subject to additional obligations and restrictions that are and will be indicated in the Terms and Conditions.
tac_paragraph_8:
You can create or join a "Team" on Aziende, which allows you to collaborate with other people. The person who creates the team is referred to as the "Team Owner." Each team may have one or more administrators (each considered an "Administrator") appointed by the Team Owner or another Administrator. Both Team Owners and Administrators can add, modify, or remove Team members and manage their permissions and access to User Content and Sites. Only the Team Owner may designate a new Team Owner. By adding someone to a Team, you represent and warrant that this person has given you or your organization all necessary consents to be added. If you enable account management services that allow you to manage Teams and Users using Aziende within your organization, you represent and warrant that you are authorized to do so on behalf of your Team or organization.
If you belong to an Aziende Teams Team, the Team Owner or an Administrator may control your access to User Content you upload and to Sites you create from the account you use as part of the Team, and may delete or transfer ownership of such content. Aziende is not responsible for any actions taken by Team Owners or Administrators. You are responsible for not uploading User Content or creating Sites in a Team-associated account if you do not want the possibility of ownership being transferred or the content or Sites being shared with other Team members.
tac_paragraph_9:
Aziende offers both free and paid services through various subscription plan options. Prices may vary depending on location and will be based on the billing details you provide at the time of purchase. If you are on an Aziende Teams plan, the Team Owner will receive the corresponding invoices and will be responsible for paying the subscription costs.
 a. Subscriptions and renewals. If you are subscribed, your subscription will automatically renew monthly or annually, as applicable. You can cancel your subscription at any time. If you cancel your subscription, you will not receive refunds or credits for any amount already billed.
 b. Pricing for additional Team members. If you are on a specific Aziende plan but need to add features or users, you will be billed according to the "Business-size pricing" model. When you add features or members to a Team, you will be charged for them on your next billing date (as defined below), unless they delete their accounts or you or an Administrator remove them from the Team before the billing date. Three (3) days before the billing date, Aziende will notify the billing contact associated with your Aziende Team account by email with the number of additional Team members and their associated subscription costs. The billing date is determined as follows: i) if you have a monthly subscription, it will coincide with the next monthly renewal date; ii) if you have an annual subscription, it will occur every three (3) months from the start date of your subscription. Subscription fees for additional Team members will be calculated based on Aziende's subscription prices. You will not receive refunds or credits for removing Team members who have already been paid for.
 c. Taxes. Your subscription fees include all applicable taxes unless otherwise specified in a contract with Aziende, within the Service, or in a relevant invoice. Tax rates are calculated based on the billing details you have provided and the applicable rate at the time your subscription is charged.
 d. Cancellation. You may stop using the Service and/or cancel your subscription at any time in your account settings. If you cancel your subscription, no amount already paid will be refunded, and any outstanding charges will become due and payable immediately.
 e. Free trials. Aziende may offer you free trials to test the Service. Aziende reserves the right to set access requirements and the duration of trial and free periods. At the end of your free trial, Aziende will charge your designated payment method the applicable subscription fee for the next billing cycle, unless you cancel your subscription before the trial ends. If you access a trial period, your access to the Service will be interrupted unless you activate a paid subscription before the trial ends.
 f. Price changes. Aziende reserves the right to change its prices at any time. If you are on a subscription plan, price changes will not apply to you until your next renewal or thirty (30) days after notification of the change, whichever is later.
 g. Billing communication. You agree that Aziende may contact you at any time via email, push notifications, or other means to communicate relevant information about your subscription, billing, and use of the Service.
tac_paragraph_10: Except as expressly provided in these Terms, all intellectual property rights in and to the Service and the Licensed Content are the exclusive property of Aziende and its licensors. Any suggestions, ideas, enhancement proposals, or other feedback you provide to Aziende regarding the Service or Aziende's products will be deemed an assignment to Aziende. Accordingly, Aziende retains ownership rights to all content, data, software, inventions, ideas, and any other technology and intellectual property it develops in connection with the Service or its products.
tac_paragraph_11: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available." To the extent permitted by applicable law and without limiting any non-waivable rights or remedies you may have under the law, Aziende, its licensors, and its suppliers expressly disclaim all warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement. Aziende does not guarantee that your use of the Service will be uninterrupted or error-free. Aziende does not warrant that it will review your data for accuracy, nor that it will preserve or maintain its integrity. You acknowledge that using the Service necessarily involves transmitting your data over networks that are not owned or controlled by Aziende, and Aziende is not responsible for any loss, alteration, interception, or storage of your data on such networks. Aziende shall not be liable for any delay, interruption, or service failure, or for any other issues inherent to the use of the internet, electronic communications, or any system outside of Aziende's reasonable control.
tac_paragraph_12: You may choose to use the Service in conjunction with third-party websites, platforms, or apps (collectively, "Third-Party Service(s)"). Your use of Third-Party Services is subject to the terms of use applicable to those Third-Party Services. Aziende makes no representations or warranties regarding Third-Party Services and expressly disclaims any and all liability arising from your use of such Third-Party Services.
tac_paragraph_13: Accept, to the extent permitted by law, indemnizar and exclude all liability to companies and their affiliates, workers, directors, agents, licensees and employees for any type of claim, costs, damage, loss, liability or gastos (including honoraria and tariffs reasonable for legal representation) to those who may incur as a result of or relating to i) your indemnity of these Terms, or ii) your User Content.
tac_paragraph_14:
Under this document, in no event shall the total aggregate liability of either party (whether in contract, tort, negligence, strict liability, statute, or otherwise) exceed the amount of i) 100 USD or ii) the amount you paid to Aziende for the subscription during the twelve (12) months prior to the event or incident giving rise to such liability. The above limitations do not apply to liabilities arising from your indemnification obligations for breach of the section titled "Restrictions on Use of the Service." 
 In no event shall either party be liable for any consequential, incidental, indirect, special, exemplary, or punitive damages, or for any losses or expenses (including, without limitation, business interruption, loss of business, or loss of profits), even if advised of the possibility of such damages and even if any remedy fails of its essential purpose. The above limitations do not apply to liabilities arising from your indemnification obligations for breach of the section titled "Restrictions on Use of the Service." 
 Aziende shall not be responsible for or assume any liability for User Content. 
 These terms do not affect consumer rights that are legally non-waivable and cannot be limited. These terms do not exclude or limit liability resulting from gross negligence, fraud, or willful misconduct by either party.
tac_paragraph_15:
a. Term. These Terms shall become effective upon your first access to the Service and will remain in effect until one of the following occurs: i) if you are a paying user, upon expiration or cancellation of your subscription, or ii) if you use the free version of Aziende, when your account is deleted or terminated. 
 b. Breaches. If Aziende, at its sole discretion, determines that you, your use of the Service, your User Content, or your Sites are in breach of these Terms, including, but not limited to, the Acceptable Use Policy or the sections titled "Restrictions on Use of the Service" or "Anti-Discrimination" (each considered a "Breach"), Aziende may, at its discretion, take one or more of the following actions: i) remove prohibited User Content or Sites; ii) suspend your access to the Service; iii) terminate and delete your account along with all associated Sites and User Content; iv) permanently ban you from using the Service; and/or v) report the User Content or Sites to the appropriate government authorities. 
 c. Effect of Termination. If your subscription is canceled due to a breach by Aziende, Aziende will refund the prorated portion of fees paid for the Service from the termination date through the end of your paid subscription. If the termination is due to your breach, you will not receive any refund and must immediately pay any outstanding charges for the remainder of your subscription term. 
 Upon expiration or cancellation of your subscription, you must stop using the Service. You will lose access to your Sites, User Content, and any other information uploaded to the Service. We may delete all such data unless otherwise required by law. User Content that is part of a shared Site will remain available on the Site after your Subscription expires. Unless your account has been canceled due to a Breach, you may download or export your User Content and Sites using the Service features before your subscription expires or is canceled. If your account is terminated due to a Breach, you may not create new accounts on any Aziende Service unless you receive written permission to do so. 
 d. Survival. The sections titled "Term and Termination", "Billing", "Aziende's Intellectual Property", "Limitation of Liability", "Indemnification Obligations", and "Miscellaneous" shall survive the expiration or termination of these Terms.
tac_paragraph_16:
a. Compliance with Applicable Law. By these Terms, you agree to comply with all applicable local, state, national, and international laws, treaties, and regulations related to your use of the Service. Aziende agrees to comply with all applicable local, state, national, and international laws, treaties, and regulations related to the provision of the Service.
 b. Governing Law and Jurisdiction. These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Florida, USA, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
 c. Export Restrictions. The Service is subject to trade sanctions and laws and regulations governing import, export, and use of the Service. Such laws and regulations may prohibit Aziende from providing the Service to you or require us to discontinue its availability without notice. By using the Service, you agree to comply with all trade sanctions, import and export laws and regulations, and you represent and warrant that: i) you are not prohibited from accessing the Service, and ii) you will not provide the Service to any person prohibited from accessing it under any applicable laws or regulations.
 d. Dispute Resolution. If you have any dispute arising from these Terms, please contact us here, and we will attempt to work with you to resolve it. If we cannot resolve a dispute with you, both you and Aziende agree to resolve any claim, dispute, or controversy (excluding injunctive or equitable relief sought by Aziende) arising from or related to these Terms and/or the Service (collectively, 'Claims') through binding arbitration before the American Arbitration Association (AAA) under its Consumer Arbitration Rules in effect at that time, unless otherwise provided in these Terms. The arbitration will be conducted via videoconference or at a location mutually agreed upon and reasonably convenient for both parties. Each party will be responsible for paying the AAA's filing, administrative, and arbitration fees in accordance with the AAA rules. The arbitrator's award may include the cost of arbitration, reasonable attorney's fees, and reasonable costs for experts and other witnesses. The award may be entered in any court of competent jurisdiction. Nothing in this section shall prevent either party from seeking injunctive or other equitable relief in court as necessary to prevent actual or imminent breach, misappropriation, or infringement of data security, intellectual property rights, or other proprietary rights. The parties shall bring any Claim in their individual capacity and not as a plaintiff or class member in any purported class or representative proceeding. Unless otherwise agreed, the arbitrator or jury may not consolidate the claims of more than one person. You agree that by entering into this agreement, both you and Aziende waive the right to a jury trial and to participate in a class action. Both you and Aziende agree that any jury trial Claim in the United States for any reason must be brought in the United States District Court for the Southern District of Florida or in the state courts of Florida in Pinellas County.
 e. Contracting Entity of Aziende. The Aziende entity with which you enter into this contract under these Terms and the address to which you should send legal documents will depend on your billing address.
 If your billing address is in the United States: The Aziende entity entering into these Terms is Comerx LLC. Legal notices should be sent to 7901 4th St N Ste 300, St. Petersburg, FL 33702, United States. Attn: Legal
 If your billing address is in a country other than the United States or the United Kingdom: The Aziende entity entering into these Terms is Comerx LLC. Legal notices should be sent to 7901 4th St N Ste 300, St. Petersburg, FL 33702, United States. Attn: Legal
 f. Purchase through a Reseller. If you purchase the Service through an authorized distributor or reseller ('Reseller'), these Terms apply to your use of the Service unless you have signed another agreement with Aziende for this use. The Reseller will be responsible for billing, so Section 8 (Billing) will not apply. Resellers are not authorized to act or make commitments on behalf of Aziende, and unless otherwise stated in a separate agreement between you and Aziende, Aziende will have no obligations other than those expressed in these Terms.
 g. Assignment. You will not assign these Terms or any rights acquired under them without Aziende's consent, except in cases of merger, acquisition, or change in control structure. Aziende may transfer or assign any of its rights and obligations under these Terms, in whole or in part, at any time, with or without notice.
 i. Severability. If any specific provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will not be affected, and the Terms will be interpreted as if the invalid or unenforceable provision were limited or omitted to the minimum necessary.
 j. Waiver. Aziende's express waiver or failure to enforce any provision of these Terms will not be construed as a present or future waiver of such provisions and will not affect Aziende's ability to enforce any provision at a later time.
 k. Notices. All required notices will be sent to you at the email address associated with your account or through other means permitted by law.
 l. Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). We respect the intellectual property rights of artists and content owners. We will respond to any notice of alleged copyright infringement submitted under the U.S. Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (DMCA). For more information, please read our Intellectual Property Policy.
 n. Changes to These Terms. We may modify these Terms (as well as any policies, contracts, or agreements referenced herein) at any time. The most current version of these Terms will always be posted on the Aziende website. We will provide you with sufficient advance notice of any changes to the Terms that we believe may materially and negatively affect your rights or use of the Service. We may send you this notice through the Service itself and/or via email to the email address associated with your account. By continuing to use the Service after the modified Terms take effect, you agree to comply with the new Terms.
 o. Changes to the Service. Aziende may add, modify, or remove features or functionalities of the Service, as well as modify or introduce storage or other feature limitations, and discontinue the Service in its entirety at any time. If you have a paid subscription and Aziende discontinues the Service you are using during your subscription period, Aziende will either switch you to or provide access to a substantially similar service provided by Aziende (if available). If it cannot do so, Aziende will refund a proportional portion of the prepaid fees corresponding to the remaining period of your subscription.
 p. Entire Agreement. These Terms, along with the agreements and policies referenced herein, constitute the entire agreement between you and Aziende regarding the Service. These Terms supersede any prior representations, contracts, or agreements between you and Aziende, whether written or oral, regarding the Service, including previous versions of these Terms. The English version of these Terms will prevail over all other versions.
Pp_subtitle_1: These terms and conditions of use are effective as of April 30, 2025.
Pp_paragraph_1: These Privacy Policies (hereinafter, "Policies") apply to your use (hereinafter, "you", "your" or "user") of the Aziende platform (hereinafter, the "Service"). By using the Service, you agree that these Policies form part of the legally binding agreement between you and the contracting entity of Aziende identified in these Terms as Comerx LLC (hereinafter, "Aziende").
Pp_paragraph_2:
Aziende has created this privacy statement to demonstrate its commitment to its users. The goal is that, through transparent and easy-to-understand information about our data practices, our users understand what data we collect, why we do it, and what we do with it. 
 This policy applies to all brands, websites, applications, products, services, or technologies of Aziende (collectively referred to as "Services"). 
 a. Information Collection: Account Level 
 At the account level, we collect and use the information necessary to allow you to purchase and manage Services, provide you with support for such Services, and optimize your experience with us. Some of the information is collected and used based on contractual consent, and others are based on informed consent, which can be modified at any time. 
 b. Basic Account Information. 
 Information Collected. Our site uses forms in which you provide us with contact information (such as your name, address, phone number, fax number, billing information, IP address, and email address) so that you can create an account, place orders, register domains, request information, and request technical support. By using your account, we may also collect technical support requests and other information related to the management of your account and the Services you offer us. 
 Legal Requirement. This type of information is legally or contractually necessary to be able to purchase and use the Services. For example, we are required to verify this type of information when our payment processor requests it. It is also necessary to be able to send you legal notifications and is mandatory for certain Services we offer. Additionally, some Services, such as domains, require this information for their purchase. If you purchase a domain from us, we are legally obligated to collect and retain this information. Furthermore, we are required to verify that the information provided is accurate and to send you legally required notifications regarding your domain(s). Consent for the collection, use, and retention of this information for these purposes is considered contractually granted during the use of such Service and any legally required retention period. 
 c. How We Use This Information. 
 Sending Emails. Legally Mandatory. As mentioned above, we use email to communicate with you, confirm your orders, send you the information you have requested, and send you legally or contractually required communications. Legally mandatory emails include verification emails required by ICANN, renewal notices, and any other policy or procedure created by ICANN governing the purchase of domains. Additionally, the law may require us to send you notifications, such as DMCA takedown notices, UDRP notifications, etc. Or, we may consider a change in one of our policies to be substantial and, therefore, determine the obligation (although not a legal requirement) to inform you of such change. This type of communication is not included in any of our opt-out procedures. 
 Sending Emails: Service Communications and Promotional Communications. We may also use this information when it is important to contact you regarding changes in the functionality of the Services you have acquired or our website, and to provide you with customer service ("Service Communications"). By creating an account with us or acquiring our Services, you agree to receive this type of communication and acknowledge that they are not optional. We also use this information to share details about new services and special offers that we believe will be useful to you ("Promotional Communications"). You can choose not to receive Promotional Communications (or accept them, depending on your country of residence) through the preferences in your account panel or by following the unsubscribe instructions included in the email communication. 
 Legally Required Disclosure. We will never share your information without your permission or in any way other than described in this policy. The only exceptions to this are when the law requires it, when we believe in good faith that such action is necessary to comply with the law, or when we must comply with a legal process. Examples of these exceptions are court orders, subpoenas, and UDRP/URS processes. In each of these situations, we will carefully review the provided documentation and only comply if such documentation meets the required legal standards. 
 Changes in Our Practices. If we modify our information handling practices or other privacy aspects, we will post such changes in this privacy statement. If we make any substantial changes, we will notify you through a notice on this site before the change takes effect, and we may also attempt to notify you by email about the privacy changes, if necessary. 
 d. Retention and Deletion of Account Information. 
 Personal Information After Account Cancellation. When your Aziende account is canceled (voluntarily or involuntarily), all your personally identifiable information is deactivated in our corresponding databases. However, you should know that deactivating your account does not mean that your personally identifiable information has been completely removed from our database. We will retain and use your personally identifiable information, if necessary, to resolve disputes, enforce our agreements, or as required by laws or regulations. Therefore, it may not be immediately deleted upon your request and constitutes an approved exception to the deletion rights under GDPR and CCPA. By creating an account with us, using our support services, or acquiring Services, you acknowledge and agree to these retention terms. 
 e. Information Collection: Site Usage 
 Device Information. We collect information from your devices (computers, mobile phones, tablets, etc.), such as your IP address and cookie information, to recognize them and send you legal notices (if your country of residence requires it), support services (when you contact our support team), and personalized experiences on our website and emails. Certain types of collection and use may be optional and controlled through our cookie tools. 
 Third-Party Information. We are dedicated to continuously improving your experience on our website. Like many companies, we use third-party tools to help us track navigation, identify technical issues, and offer you ways to improve your overall experience. Some of the tools we use and their functions are: 
 Log Files: We use the information collected about you from our site's statistics through log files provided by external tracking partners (e.g., your IP address) to diagnose problems with our server and manage our website. We also collect general demographic information from these data to help us improve our site and make your browsing and shopping experience more enjoyable. This is not linked to any personally identifiable information. 
 Cookies: Our site uses cookies to record your session information. We link the information we store in cookies with the personal information you submit while visiting our site. We use both session identification cookies and persistent cookies. A session identification cookie expires when you close your browser. A persistent cookie remains on your hard drive for an extended period. You can delete persistent cookies by following your browser's help instructions. 
 We also use cookies to store your username if you request it to be remembered when logging in. This information will be used to automatically fill in the login form later. If an advertisement or partner refers you to our website, we will store the referral information in cookies. The use of cookies by our partners, affiliates, tracking utility companies, and service providers is not covered by our privacy statement. We have no access or control over these cookies. Our tracking service company uses session ID cookies to help us improve our site and make your browsing and shopping experience more enjoyable. Customers in countries subject to GDPR and LGPD can consult their cookie preference panel for additional instructions on how to enable or disable cookies. You can access the cookie preference panel once you have activated the cookie policy pop-up. You can find more information about the categories of cookies we use and our specific cookie policy here. By continuing to use and browse our sites, services, applications, tools, or messages, you agree to the use of cookies described in this Privacy Policy. 
 Requests and/or Messages: From time to time, we request information from users through surveys or contests. Participation in these surveys or contests is completely voluntary, and therefore, the user has the option to respond and disclose this information. The requested information may include contact information (such as name, email, and shipping address) and demographic information (such as zip code and age). Contact information will be used to notify winners and deliver prizes. Survey information will be used to monitor or improve the use and satisfaction of this site or for any other purpose we explicitly state in the contest rules. 
 Product Offers and Third-Party Websites: Our site also contains links to other third-party websites, especially where they offer a specialized service that adds value to our users in creating their sites. Aziende is not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of such websites. We recommend that you carefully read the privacy statement of any website you visit.
Pp_paragraph_3:
Aziende shares information with its brands and affiliated companies. We also share the information we have about you for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy, including providing the Services you have requested. We do not share information that individually identifies our customers with companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Aziende unless one of the following circumstances applies: 
 With your consent. We will share information with companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Aziende when we have your consent. This includes third-party providers who offer products or services through our platform. Please note that each of these providers will have their own privacy policies and will be individually identified. 
 Within Aziende. Information may also be shared within Aziende to support and deliver the Services you acquire. 
 With partners. We may share your information with unaffiliated companies that are: 
 Advertising, analytics, and business partners (limited to non-personally identifiable information). We may share aggregated or pseudonymous information (including demographic data) with partners such as measurement analytics firms, apps, or other companies. However, we do not share information that personally identifies you (personally identifiable information includes details such as your name or email address). When you use third-party apps, websites, or other products integrated with our Services, they may collect information about your activities, subject to their own terms and privacy policies. 
 For legal and other purposes. We may access, preserve, and disclose information to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding: (i) legal processes and requests; (ii) enforcement of our Terms and Conditions; (iii) claims that any content violates the rights of third parties; (iv) customer service requests; (v) technical issues; (vi) protection of the rights, property, or personal safety of Aziende, its users, or the public; (vii) establishment or exercise of our legal rights or defense against legal claims; or (viii) as required by law. This may include responding to legitimate government requests. 
 New ownership. If ownership or control of all or part of Aziende or a specific Service changes as a result of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, we may transfer your information to the new owner.
Pp_paragraph_4:
Our site has security measures in place to protect the information under our control from loss, misuse, and alteration. We use 128-bit SSL security to encrypt any transmission when you provide credit card information, personal data, and so on. However, no method of electronic storage or transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. a. Protection of Children's Privacy: Our services are intended for the general public. We do not knowingly collect, use, or share information that could reasonably be used to identify minors under the age of 18 without prior parental consent or in accordance with applicable law. b. Data Processing and Transfer: By using or interacting with any of our services, you consent to the processing, sharing, transfer, and use of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. This will only be done when necessary for the performance of our contract with you, where we have your consent, or subject to applicable standard contractual clauses. Regardless of your country of residence, you acknowledge that you are directly transferring your data to our servers located in the United States and consent to processing within the United States, where Aziende processes your data. You also authorize us to transfer, process, store, and use your information in countries other than your own, in accordance with this Privacy Policy, and to provide you with Services. Some of these countries may not have the same data protection safeguards as your country of residence. By using our Services, you consent to our transfer of information about you to these countries. c. Compliance with legal, regulatory, and law enforcement requests: We cooperate with government, law enforcement, and private entities to enforce the law. We may disclose any information about you to government officials, law enforcement, or private entities when, in our sole discretion, we believe it is necessary or appropriate to respond to claims and legal processes (such as subpoena requests), to protect our property and rights or those of third parties, to protect the safety of the public or any person, or to prevent or stop activities we consider unlawful or unethical. To the extent permitted by law, we may take reasonable steps to notify you if we are compelled to provide your personal information to third parties as part of a legal process. We will also share your information to the extent necessary to comply with ICANN, registry, or ccTLD rules, regulations, and policies when you register a domain name with us through our authorized provider. For reasons crucial to maintaining the security, stability, and resilience of the Internet, this includes transferring domain name registration information to the underlying domain registry operator and escrow provider, and disclosing such information as required by ICANN or with other third parties that demonstrate a legitimate interest in such information. 
 d. Other important information: This Privacy Policy applies only to Aziende. This Privacy Policy does not apply to the practices of companies that Aziende does not own or control, nor to individuals that Aziende does not employ or manage. In addition, some third-party products may have different privacy policies and practices that are not subject to this Privacy Policy. 
 e. Changes: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time, so we encourage you to review it periodically. If we make significant changes, we will notify you promptly before those changes become effective. 
 If you have questions, suggestions, or would like to file a complaint, please fill out the contact form located on the Aziende website.
